author: Mike B.
text:
How many of you are aware of how you are before you start?
I’m direct, straight to the point, relentless, abrasive, etc….it doesn’t make it right but I am aware & I have to make changes.
Once you start with your awareness, the change will come.

author: Mike B.
text:
Always remain consistent in your good actions & good behavior. Even when you are annoyed, sick, upset, tired, etc…..let your actions speaker louder, kinder & more loving than your words.

My folks know I’ll bless you out & feed you at the same damn time.

#tuesdayvibe

author: Mike B.
text:
Your inconsistency will always have a hold on you. An effect on your own capabilities. That’s a problem.
When it starts to affect your loved ones & surrounding, you’re in trouble.

#TuesdayAM

author: Mike B.
text: Happy #TeacherAppreciationWeek

author: Mike B.
text:
Dear Creator,

Shine the guidance for those who have no boundaries in their life, release their toxic behavior for it has been allowed and not corrected & strengthen them to push through because the process is not easy.

#Ase

author: Mike B.
text:
When you confront that first moment of pain, tell it this;

“I am so sorry that I let you go on this long in hurt & agony. You no longer get to dictate my life anymore.”

Then let it flow like a River. Get Your Healing. Step Into Your Fullness.

#wednesdaythought

author: Mike B.
text:
Many of you as adults are stuck in the age where you first experience hurt. You’re birth certificate says 36 but you act 9.
Go back & acknowledge that pain.
For the elevation of your future. Your spouse. Your children. Yourself.

#BeInPeace

author: Mike B.
text:
You don’t get to be hurt, broken, etc and facilitate the process. You don’t have the tools to navigate.
Allow faith, hope, support, charity, love & equipped individuals to be your guiding light. God created those things for a reason.

Be In Peace & Not Pieces. #TuesdayMotivaton

author: Mike B.
text:
This what we doing.
This is why I stay in the house. https://t.co/BZokkUwQdk

author: Mike B.
text:
The price of the patience I want is as high as these gas prices.
It feels like you just want to leave your “patience tank” on me E & park it.
But I know that isn’t what is apart of the divine order for me.

Remember to #TrustGod & #TrustTheProcess 

#BeInPeace

author: Mike B.
text:
I don’t ask God for patience because God will give it to you in a way you don’t want it. So I am learning how to practice it & understand it’s meaning.
What I did asked God was to not let the little bit I have run out. 

#TrustGod
#TrustTheProcess

author: Mike B.
text:
Remember you won’t like the process. It will make you feel uncomfortable, mad, upset, etc..
Your experiences & feelings can’t be the only accurate ones. Others will have to be honored as well.

#BeInPeace #NotInPieces

author: Mike B.
text:
Did you take your moment. I did. 

Sometimes you just need a rest not a reset. Rest clears the vision in reality.
My plate cannot be full when my son arrives. He & my daughter need me in my fullness. I’m not perfect, just a damn good parent. 

#BeInPeace

author: Mike B.
text:
To my brothers out there juggling so much. It’s okay. You have the right to be exhausted. You have the right to be tired. We remain so selfless & so by ourselves. God knows. Your brothers know. 
It’s hard but you have the right to take a moment for yourself.

#BeInPeace

author: Mike B.
text:
April 21st in my family is a day we honor. God gave us life, sent for his angel & we celebrated an elder on this day.

Mussa Day
Deandre Day
Joy Baby Day
Calil Day

Thankful for my Aunt Jackie & GreatGrandmother Lillie Pearl. Forever in our hearts. 🕊 🕊 

#RIPPrince

author: Mike B.
text:
Some of us have smart mouths & harsh words because no one ever spoke up for us. No One!
Some of you are just entitled & use your words to attack & hurt others.

Both come from pain & places we had no control over.

But now you have control.

#BeWell #ThursdayMotivation

author: Mike B.
text:
One of the hardest things to do is let your loves ones who have become dependent on you fall…but they have to learn how to get up. There comes a time where you no longer can drag them around or protect them. They must walk in their own shoes.

#LiveInPeace

author: Mike B.
text: Doing what is familiar and comfortable is not always the best choice. Try the unknown. #LiveInPeace

author: Mike B.
text:
Being.
Doing.
Having.

#LiveInPeace

author: Mike B.
text: I love great conversations where we have to take a look at where we come from & be the change we want to see. Sitting with my loved ones this evening. It’s take a lot to acknowledge the truth in your experience. But that awareness, makes you feel so much better. #LiveInPeace

author: Mike B.
text:
Black men & women, you do NOT get to scream your feelings to a people without acknowledging your attacks on others including those you say hurt your feelings.
Hurt people hurt people & you don’t get the right to hurt.
Today we are learning how to simply express how we feel.

author: Mike B.
text:
I meet children where they are. But adults have to come UP to my level. Stagnant Adults are not your responsibility. When you love them, it’s okay to throw them a life ring, just remember not to allow their burdens to pull you down.

#TuesdayFeeling

author: Mike B.
text: Thank You!!! ✊🏾😭😭🙌🏾🙌🏾🙌🏾 https://t.co/4z4pTO5hD5

author: Mike B.
text:
Blackish taking me out 😭😭😭😭😭

#blackish #abc 

Thank You @funnyblackdude & the whole cast for 8 seasons of black magic.

author: Mike B.
text: 4/20 not 4/19 ain’t it 👀👀👀 https://t.co/B5TLvNQ5fr

author: Mike B.
text: Bernie & Nina gotta go….listen 😂

author: Mike B.
text: 😂😂 ‘Wayment’ https://t.co/ETcsusm29w

author: Mike B.
text: Oh T.I. got booed. Tragic.

author: Mike B.
text: Congrats nephew!! https://t.co/Pfq2zx12n9

author: Mike B.
text:
And I went to local GA schools, (2 degrees). And I have to work harder than my some of my white colleagues with 0-1 degrees. So at this point, #CancelStudentDebtNow so I can participate in the economy yall keep complaining about. 

My salary nice too.

author: Mike B.
text:
Like I told one of my white colleagues & friends, everybody did not have that experience of knowledgeable parents or guidance counselors with college. Many black millennials are first & second generation college grads. Loans was the only choice to get it.

#CancelStudentDebtNow

author: Mike B.
text:
How are you “Africant-Americant” (as Madea would say) & a Democrat with a problem with the Progressive Democrats wanting to Cancel All Student Loans. That is huge especially for Black millennials.

#CancelStudentDebt

author: Mike B.
text:
If Democrats want the black vote, you are going to catch the same questions, criticism, cuss words, judgement, etc from the voters. You’re a “poLIEtician” just like your conservative colleagues.

Are we clear??

author: Mike B.
text: You know….just push unfollow on some of these political twitter commentators. Like as a black man, I have every right to question the individuals I support, vote for, etc….as somebody in media, it doesn’t make us toxic or ignorant. We are just asking questions for clarity.

author: Mike B.
text: JUSTICE Ketanji Brown Jackson. #thatsthetweet #KetanjiBrownJackson #JudgeKetanjiBrownJackson

author: Mike B.
text: What a game. #WHATAGAME #FinalFour2022

author: Mike B.
text:

#Original #ATL #30316 #30311 #30331 #atlien #NeverDuplicated #Swatz
